EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1361576658.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information (1361576658.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Bing, No problem at all, thanks for letting me know. Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> We’ve got some serious perks you’re eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Bing [mailto:bbingel@att.net] Sent: Friday, February 22, 2013 1:48 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Quick heads up . . . Technically, I’m still married but though going through the last few steps of a divorce, which should be complete in early 2013. My tax accountant suggests that, for 2013 tax purposes, I should fill out all tax forms as Single (No Dependents). Thought you should know, just in case the topic ever comes up . . . -- Bing From: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>] Sent: Thursday, February 21, 2013 12:43 PM To: bing@itm3.com <mailto:bing@itm3.com> Subject: MBO Partners Enrollment Information Dear Bradford, Welcome to MBO Partners! Enclosed are the instructions you will need to become an MBO Associate. You can begin and resume this process at any time. - Please begin enrollment by clicking here <https://app1.mbopartners.com/web/join/link?display=PersonalInfo&ec=MBOMBE&reset=true&cd=10A6BD7A64E35761D042C0>. - Continue the online enrollment by following the instructions. - At the end of the enrollment process you will be asked to print out the enrollment packet. Please review this packet and follow the proper instructions. Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions or concerns.
We look forward to working with you. Regards, Sara CondeEnrollment Manager Direct: 703-793-6028 Toll Free: 800-556-0270MBO Partners13454 Sunrise Valley Dr., Ste 300Herndon, VA 20171http://www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com%20>Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
